messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content: I am from Wolverhampton where I have lived for most of my life. It is a privilege to be your Brexit Party Parliamentary Candidate here in Newcastle-Under-Lyme. I am a consultant cardiovascular surgeon, and if elected I would strive to protect and restore our beloved NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money, and defence.
Spend £200bn on transport, and jobs in the regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.
Keep investing. Better management, less waste.
Let's make Parliament serve the people.

issues.brexitEurope: A Clean-Break Brexit. We must control our laws, borders, money, and defence.
issues.economy: A Brexit Dividend. Spend £200bn on transport, and jobs in the regions.
issues.governance: Fundamental Democratic Reform. Let's make Parliament serve the people.
issues.health: Supporting the NHS. Keep investing. Better management, less waste.
issues.immigration: Controlled Immigration. We need a fair, firm points-based system.
issues.transport: A Brexit Dividend. Spend £200bn on transport, and jobs in the regions.

community.content: To reform political system, so that Parliament represents the people. For a clean break Brexit. To invest £200 billion in our neglected regions - creating well-paid, highly skilled jobs. To restore bolstered trees on the high streets in our town. To increase police numbers and tackle anti-social behaviour.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am from Wolverhampton where I have lived for most of my life. It is a privilege to be your Brexit Party Parliamentary Candidate here in Newcastle-Under-Lyme. I am a consultant cardiovascular surgeon, and if elected I would strive to protect and restore our beloved NHS.

images.caption: Nigel Farage, Leader of The Brexit Party
